video.title: Ace of Cakes Collection
video.synopsis: Duff Goldman and his rock 'n' roll crew use power tools to shape cakes, from a tall, tilted Dr. Seuss-like wedding cake to a replica of Wrigley Field.

episodes.synopsis: Duff creates a towering cake statue of an Egyptian pharaoh; Lauren and Duff do a high-flying act; the staff makes a cake live on stage in 45 minutes.
episodes.title: Miami Meltdown

episodes.synopsis: At Charm City Cakes, Duff and his crew are challenged by a request for a roller coaster cake; the cake makers reflect on 100 slices of bakery life.
episodes.title: 100 Episodes of Cake

episodes.synopsis: Duff plays a game of sled hockey; Tommy summons memories of the "Knight Rider" TV show and makes a KITT car cake; Duff and Geof joke with Drew Carey.
episodes.title: Indy, Ice and Improv

episodes.synopsis: Charm City Cakes takes on one of its biggest architectural challenges to date: recreating the famous Neuschwanstein Castle in Bavaria.
episodes.title: Duff Goes to Bat

episodes.synopsis: The bakery mourns the loss of a landmark when a hot dog stand cake is cancelled after the location burns down on the morning of its 70th anniversary.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday Jimmy John's

episodes.synopsis: Duff and his team plan to launch the first-ever rocket cake. Will it survive its voyage into space and its return to Earth?
episodes.title: Full Throttle Bakery

episodes.synopsis: Duff rocks out with the choir when he takes a Grammy-inspired cake to a famous New York school; Mary Alice and Geof deliver a cake to Geof's hometown.
episodes.title: Duff Music Mayhem

episodes.synopsis: Duff rushes to finish a wildly ambitious cake for the 85th anniversary of the Grand Ole Opry -- a cake that contains a real, operational microphone.
episodes.title: Grand Ole Opry

episodes.synopsis: Duff heads west in his RV for some sheep shearing, muzzle loading and a 175th year anniversary cake for a town too small to have a stoplight.
episodes.title: Charm City...Off the Grid

episodes.synopsis: Duff and Geof head south for some Cadillac graffiti, gun shooting and mule riding; Duff drives a racecar and makes a cake for a speedway racing team.
episodes.title: Slow Mules and Fast Cars

episodes.synopsis: The team packs its bags and heads to England to bake a cake for Shakespeare's Globe Theatre, and wine and dine with some of London's best chefs.
episodes.title: Duff UK Invasion

episodes.synopsis: Duff is invited to present a cake at the U.S. Open Grand Slam Tennis Tournament; Ben builds a cake for the 30th anniversary of "MotorWeek."
episodes.title: US Open

episodes.synopsis: The decorators get crazy when Duff goes away on a holy quest; Betty White gets emotional when she receives a cake for her favorite animal charity.
episodes.title: Betty White Takes the Cake

episodes.synopsis: Duff's crew goes into overdrive to make a cake for a big episode of a hit game show; Elena burns the midnight oil to finish a cake for an indie band.
episodes.title: A Millionaire Moment

episodes.synopsis: Duff is asked to appear on "The Price is Right," where three huge cakes will be featured on the show. The crew must drive across the country.
episodes.title: Come on Down

episodes.synopsis: A confection for the New York Rangers requires 85 cupcakes as part of the design; the crew struggles delivering a knight cake to Medieval Times.
episodes.title: A Cake in Shining Armor

episodes.synopsis: Movie stars reunite to celebrate the 25th anniversary of their film as Duff unveils the ultimate DeLorean time machine -- made out of cake.
episodes.title: Charm City: Back to the Future

episodes.synopsis: The crew concocts a crossword puzzle cake; Duff's team hobnobs with stars at a USO gala, then delivers the cake to everyday service men and women.
episodes.title: A Four Letter Word for Pastry

episodes.synopsis: Duff battles an impossible deadline to create a cake to take to Oprah on a TV set in Chicago; the Avett Brothers visit the bakery.
episodes.title: Oprah!

episodes.synopsis: Charm City's decorators tackle two formidable orders, creating replicas of a terracotta warrior from China and Russia's St. Basil's Cathedral.
episodes.title: The Revenge of Ivan the Terrible
